contents.event: Sending of Simula Invites to Freshies
contents.desc: Our official Simula Invites give you an idea of what to expect for this year’s AFYOP Simula — from our schedule of activities, gimmicks, and rules and guidelines. Tell us if you have not received one yet!

contents.event: Creation of Simula Group Chats with Freshies
contents.desc: Your Simula Group Chats will be the perfect avenue for you to easily connect with your facilitators and classmates real-time. Tell us if you have not been added yet!

contents.platform: Platform: Zoom [to be sent through Simula Group Chats]
contents.desc: This is the perfect avenue for you to know more your facilitators and classmates before the breakout sessions. Join us as we have fun through our games and activities as we prepare ourselves for the AFYOP Proper Week.
Join us in this special Eucharistic Celebration as we officially welcome the first years in this year’s AFYOP.

contents.platform: Platform: Ateneo First Year Onboarding Program Facebook Live
contents.desc: Simulan na ang iyong AFYOP kwuento by tuning in to the Live Opening Ceremony as we officially kick-start this year’s AFYOP.

contents.event: AFYOP Simula 2022 Breakout Sessions for ACCOUNTANCY, NURSING, and EDUCATION Freshies
contents.platform: Platform: Zoom [sent through Simula Invites and Group Chats]
contents.desc: Today marks the first day of the breakout sessions of the freshies coming from the Accountancy, Nursing, and Education Cluster.

contents.event: AFYOP Simula 2022 Breakout Sessions for BUSINESS & MANAGEMENT, HUMANITIES AND LETTERS, NATURAL SCIENCES AND MATHEMATICS, and SOCIAL SCIENCES
contents.platform: Platform: Zoom [sent through Simula Invites and Group Chats]
contents.desc: Onto the second day of breakout sessions with the freshies from the Business & Management, Humanities and Letter, Natural Sciences and Mathematics, and Social Sciences Cluster.

contents.event: AFYOP Simula 2022 Breakout Sessions for ENGINEERING AND ARCHITECTURE and COMPUTER STUDIES
contents.platform: Platform: Zoom [sent through Simula Invites and Group Chats]
contents.desc: The last day of the breakout sessions is finally here as we welcome the freshies from the Engineering and Architecture and Computer Studies Clusters.

contents.platform: Platform: Ateneo First Year Onboarding Program Facebook Live
contents.desc: We are now officially down to the last day of our AFYOP week. Tune in to the Closing Ceremony as we get to share and learn different stories from our AFYOP experience, know the winners from our most-awaited AFYOP Sensation, and more!

contents.platform: Venue: Ateneo de Davao University, Jacinto Campus
contents.desc: This year, we welcome our incoming Freshies, Sophomores, and Juniors back to our University campus through our Campus Tour and Org Fair, now on its blended modality. See you in campus!
